'''V'''ision| sister_stations = [[DYKC-TV]]([[Radio Philippines Network|RPN]])| former_affiliations = | former_callsigns = Independent (1961-1975)| effective_radiated_power = 5,000 Watts| homepage = | }} '''DYTV-TV''', channel 13, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation]]. Its studios are located at Maguikay, Mandaue City and transmitter located at Kalunasan, Cebu City. == See also == * [[Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation]] {{Metro Cebu TV}} {{IBC Visayas}} [[Category:Television in Cebu City]] [[Category:Television stations in the Philippines]] [[Category:Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation stations]] {{Philippines-tv-stub}} [[ceb:DYTV-TV]] [[tl:DYTV-TV]]
